mainHero.title: Recieptsy
mainHero.subtitle: Makes it easy..
mainHero.description: Transform your cluttered receipts into organized digital data with our app. Just a quick scan sorts and stores your receipts. Easily find your financials, generate reports with a tap, and enjoy simple expense tracking. Our app is your pocket-sized personal accountant!

items.title: Free Your Mind
items.description: Just let us handle your cumbersome tasks of sorting and filing all your receipts. Our app effortlessly scans and organizes your receipts, eliminating the need to sift through piles of paper. Easily search and sort receipts, and generate detailed reports to gain insights into your spending. Simplify your life and manage your expenses with ease.

items.title: Make it your own!
items.description: Sort, search, and generate reports as per your needs. Customize your experience with easy access to your data at your fingertips. Tailor the app to fit your personal or business requirements, ensuring you get the most relevant insights. Our intuitive interface makes managing your receipts and expenses a breeze, giving you control and convenience like never before.

features.title: Latest & greatest
features.subtitle: All the best technologies out there!

items.name: React.js
items.description: React is a free and open-source front-end JavaScript library for building user interfaces or UI components.

items.name: Tailwind
items.description: Tailwind CSS is a highly customizable, low-level CSS framework for quickly creating beautiful designs without any annoying opinionated stylesheet nonsense.

items.name: Next.js
items.description: Next.js is a framework for server-rendered React applications using Next.js.

items.name: Typescript
items.description: TypeScript is a programming language developed and maintained by Microsoft.
